professional_summary: Data Analyst with hands-on experience in financial analysis and data analysis. Proficient in SAS, Python, SQL, and Tableau. Experienced in ETL processes, data warehouse design, and database administration.

key_responsibilities: Developed SAS programs for generating weekly student census reports.
Designed annual reports using SAS Visual Analytics and Tableau for senior management.
ETL using SAS Enterprise Guide and SSIS
Designed SQL programs for monitoring user accounts and streamlining data uploads.
Performed ETL processes and data validation using SAS and SSIS.
Collected and prepared data for analysis using Python.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Systems
education.institution: Gabelli School of Business at Fordham University

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Financial Management
education.institution: School of Management at Shanghai University of Engineering Science
